title: Sidewall And Border, ca. 1800
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Red roses on branch with bow know at end. Rose motifs separated by vining foliage with red berries. Printed in red, white, blue and black on spotted ground. Narrow acanthus architectural molding along 2 edges. Original document for "Flower and Ribbon,"

participants.person_name: The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology

Sidewall And Border, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Block-printed on joined sheets. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-167.
